page.title: 18INDUSTRY
page.content: In some of the woodland there is a a famous old house,"Holwood",once owned by a Prime Minister,William Pitt.It is owned by a firm called Seismograph Company,England,Limited.A seismograpgh is something that researches into oil and minerals and where to dig for these. In these woods there is also a famous oa tree called the"Wilberforce Oak".Under this tree sat the Prime Minister,Pitt and William Wilberforce.Here they planned the abolition of slavery.A bench was erected on the site years later with thefollowing words from Wilberforce's diary:
